Here, within walking distance to the beach, each of the 267 guestrooms and spaces successfully harnesses the city’s abundant ocean breezes and natural light, while the interior design pays homage to the organic tones and textures of the local coastline. Santa Monica Proper tempts guests with the only rooftop pool deck on the Westside, a singular vantage point for sunsets over the Pacific that includes a Balearic restaurant, bar, and cabanas, while the landmark Onda restaurant, marks a synergistic collaboration between James Beard award-winning chefs Jessica Koslow and Gabriela Camara. Taking Eastern-inspired wellness as a guide, the hotel’s Surya Spa (opening in winter), presided over by internationally renowned Ayurvedic guru Martha Soffer, offers tailored holistic health programs. Anything less just wouldn't be Proper.Marriott

name: Embassy Suites by Hilton Los Angeles International Airport South
address: 1440 East Imperial Avenue, El Segundo, CA 90245
description: Experience the Finest of California and LAX Hotels LAX hotels come no finer than the Embassy Suites Los Angeles - International Airport/South Hotel, located just two miles from Los Angeles International Airport (LAX) in the quiet community of El Segundo, CA, home to numerous Fortune 500 companies and the heart of Southern California's aerospace community. Guests at our hotel stay in spacious two-room suites and receive a delicious free made-to-order breakfast each morning and hosted beverages and snacks every evening at our Evening Reception. The Embassy Suites - LAX South is ideal for a Southern California vacation with a wide array of local beaches in the surrounding communities: Manhattan Beach, Marina Del Rey, Redondo Beach, Venice Beach, Santa Monica, home of the Third Street Promenade. This all-suite Los Angeles hotel is just minutes from the Los Angeles Air Force Base, as well as the campus of Loyola Marymount University. The Embassy Suites - LAX South is one of the premier Los Angeles vacation hotels with wonderful amenities and an endless variety of surrounding tourist attractions, making this hotel perfect for southern California family vacations! This Los Angeles hotel offers high-speed Internet access throughout, as well as an on-site ATM. A lush tropical atrium and Koi fish, ducks, and turtles in gently flowing waterscapes, combined with the Mediterranean-style architecture, provide the perfect setting for a relaxing LA visit. 1440 bistro & bar, a contemporary twist on American fare, is located in the Embassy Suites Los Angeles - International Airport/South hotel. The lounge features a wide variety of spirits and wine, televisions with sporting events, and a pool table. This Los Angeles hotel is also ideal for business travelers, with its proximity to Los Angeles International Airport, Internet access throughout, and 11 meeting spaces. These spaces can be easily converted for a Southern California wedding, reception, and other special events. In order to stand out among other El Segundo hotels, we offer prime California accommodations with its convenient locale and extensive amenities. Visit one of the exciting Los Angeles tourist attractions in the area: Chinatown, Downtown Los Angeles, Rodeo Drive in Beverly Hills, The Fashion District of Los Angeles, The Hollywood Walk of Fame, The Los Angeles County Museum of Art, The Paul Getty Museum, The Queen Mary in Long Beach, The Staples Center - home of professional basketball teams, and Universal Studios. The Embassy Suites Hotel Los Angeles - International Airport/South invites you to indulge in this upscale, full-service hotel and all of the extensive services and amenities provided. Make your reservations now to ensure secure online booking at our Best Available Rate, or take advantage of the terrific Southern California vacation deals of our LAX hotel!Hilton

name: JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 900 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience a new level of luxury at JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Offering an unbeatable location in the heart of downtown Los Angeles, only steps away from the excitement of L.A. LIVE, the Convention Center, Peacock Theatre and Crypto.com Arena, our hotel is ideally suited for both business and leisure travelers. Our hotel rooms and suites feature luxury bedding, a flat-screen TV, an ergonomic workspace and a marble bathroom, and many rooms offer magnificent downtown views. Savor fresh local fare at our on-site restaurants, pamper yourself at our spa or relax by our sparkling outdoor pool. Those seeking a remarkable destination for a business or social event in downtown Los Angeles can take advantage of 135,000 square feet of versatile, contemporary venue space, as well as knowledgeable planning and catering teams. Along with placing you moments from L.A. LIVE, our hotel is convenient to the University of Southern California and Dodger Stadium. Luxury abounds at JW Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE.Marriott

name: Sheraton Universal Hotel
address: 333 Universal Hollywood Drive, Universal City, CA 91608
description: Find the AAA 4-diamond Sheraton Universal Hotel nestled beneath the Hollywood Hills, minutes from Universal Studios Hollywood and Universal City. Walk to the Red Line metro for easy access to attractions throughout Los Angeles, CA, including the Walk of Fame and TCL Chinese Theatre. Our hotel rooms pay homage to our Hollywood history with a sleek, minimalist ambiance. Recharge with Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience® beds, smart TVs and floor-to-ceiling windows with stunning views of Universal Studios, the San Fernando Valley or the Hollywood Hills. Start your day with breakfast at The California, then ride our free shuttle to Universal Studios Hollywood. After a day in the park, unwind beside our hotel pool or visit In the Mix, our on-site bar serving an extensive selection of drinks. Take in 270-degree views of Hollywood, CA, from the 20-foot windows in the rooftop Starview Room. Whether you're visiting California for a business trip or family vacation, Sheraton Universal Hotel welcomes you.Marriott

name: Channel Road Inn, A Four Sisters Inn
address: 219 West Channel Road, Santa Monica, CA 90402
description: Ideally in the beach-side community of Santa Monica, California, this bed and breakfast features unique guest rooms just minutes from beautiful beaches. Channel Road Inn features 15 individually decorated guest rooms with private baths. Select rooms have fireplaces, jetted tubs or partial ocean views. Enjoy a hearty breakfast buffet in the morning and complimentary afternoon wine and hors d'oeuvres at Channel Inn. Freshly baked cookies and a variety of beverages are available throughout the day.

name: Marina del Rey Marriott
address: 4100 Admiralty Way, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: Experience Southern California’s allure at the Marina del Rey Marriott. Overlooking Mother’s Beach, this boutique hotel offers a location that is a perfect balance of relaxation while accessible to the technology and entertainment industries in Playa Vista and Culver City. This dog friendly hotel will allow you and your furry friend to experience the beachside escape that is Marina Del Rey. Indulge in craft cocktails at the Sinder bar and outdoor patio, work out in our Fitness Center, and escape in our new M Club with indoor and outdoor lounges. Take a swim in our pool, cruise the beach on an electric bike, and experience a curated meal in our restaurant. We offer 20,000 square feet of flexible meeting space, including a rooftop ballroom with views of the marina and Pacific Ocean. At the end of the day, retreat to our modernized guest rooms with private balconies overlooking the marina or Santa Monica. Inspired by local influences, our hotel captivates both business and leisure guests alike.Marriott

name: Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport
address: 7501 North Glenoaks Boulevard, Burbank, CA 91504
description: The Hampton Inn & Suites Los Angeles Burbank Airport is located in the center of everything: the Bob Hope Airport, shopping, dining, and entertainment are all within minutes of the hotel. See one of your favorite game shows or late night talk shows in person. We are proud to have Disney, Universal Studios, NBC, CBS & Fox as our neighbors, in the heart of Burbank. Feel like seeing more? Visit Six Flags Magic Mountain, Disneyland, California Adventure Land or Knott’s Berry Farm Amusement parks for a thrill you and your family will be sure not to forget. Surf on over to the Santa Monica beach and Pier or cruise on over to the Venice Boardwalk for authentic street entertainment. If your into snowboarding or skiing Big Bear lake, Mountain High & Snow Summit are only hours away! Whether you're surfing the web or checking your e-mail, take advantage of our complimentary high-speed Internet access in our guest rooms and lobby area to save you time and money. Our guest rooms come equipped with a large work desk equipped and an ergonomic chair and a data port for wired connectivity. Feel like relaxing on the bed and working? Our Cloud Nine bed does away with the old-fashioned bedspread, featuring instead a, white duvet cover, enveloping a lofty white comforter. The bed features four pillows providing consumers a choice in firmness (some filled with soft down, some with firmer foam), a lumbar pillow in a soothing color that provides guests back support if they choose to read, watch television or enjoy the Hampton lap desk and work wirelessly while resting in bed. Relax and unwind with an in-room movie or take advantage of our heated pool and spa. Working through the night and need a late night energy boost? Purchase a light snack or drink from our convenient suite shop located in lobby. And don't forget about the complimentary On the House hot breakfast in the morning. Our new utensils, made from 100% renewable resources, will help you reduce your carbon footprint, one step at a time, and feed your hunger all in a days work. In a hurry? Grab one of our On The Run Breakfast Bags with over 20 different items to start each day off right. Before you start your day, don't forget to grab a complimentary cup of coffee/tea or pick-up a copy of the latest USA Today in the lobby each morning. We also provide complimentary parking and shuttle service to the Burbank Airport. Every stay with the Hampton Inn & Suites Burbank Airport offers you additional points and miles for your travel, so sign up for your Hilton HHonors loyalty program today! Our unconditional 100% Hampton Guarantee ensures our travelers complete satisfaction. Friendly service, clean rooms, comfortable surroundings, every time. If you are not completely satisfied, we don't expect you to pay. That's our commitment and your guarantee. That's 100% HamptonHilton

name: Warner Center Marriott Woodland Hills
address: 21850 Oxnard Street, Woodland Hills, CA 91367
description: Discover an alluring retreat at the newly re-energized and refreshed Warner Center Marriott Woodland Hills. Our lush, resort-like escape is in the heart of the San Fernando Valley and just a short drive away from Hollywood, Los Angeles, Burbank and Simi Valley. After soaking up the sun at Malibu beaches and enjoying the area's premier attractions, find stylish and sophisticated amenities at our north Los Angeles hotel including select rooms and suites with access to our exclusive M Club Lounge. Our upscale accommodations feature plush bedding, 50-inch flat-panel HDTVs and private balconies showing off scenic views. To recharge, caffeinate at our full-service Starbucks Café. Whether you're exploring the vibrant area or taking advantage of our plentiful event space for your business or social soiree, seek a thrilling Golden State getaway at Warner Center Marriott Woodland Hills.Marriott

name: Courtyard by Marriott Marina del Rey
address: 4360 Via Marina, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: Courtyard Marina del Rey is a bright, modern, new hotel located on the marina in the heart of Marina del Rey. Stay at our hotel to be near popular attractions like the Santa Monica Boardwalk, Venice Fishing Pier and Marina Beach. Our hotel is unique in that it is connected to a Residence Inn® hotel, allowing you to take advantage of extra amenities like guest laundry facilities, a larger fitness center and additional event space. Our state-of-the-art lobby provides greater flexibility and choices for hotel guests. At the center of it all is Brizo Bar & Restaurant, your destination for a great weekend brunch or drinks and dinner in the evening. You'll also enjoy inviting, flexible spaces with free Wi-Fi where you can work or relax. Plus, our well-equipped fitness center and outdoor pool will help you stay refreshed and energized. Whether visiting our hotel for business or pleasure, your stay at Courtyard Marina del Rey is sure to be more comfortable, more productive and more enjoyable than ever!Marriott

name: Courtyard by Marriott Los Angeles Torrance/Palos Verdes
address: 2633 Sepulveda Boulevard, Torrance, CA 90505
description: Find the perfect home base for your SoCal getaway at Courtyard Los Angeles Torrance/Palos Verdes in Torrance, CA. Start your trip with seamless travel thanks to our hotel's location near Los Angeles International Airport and Long Beach Airport. Sample the best of the Palos Verdes area when you fill your Del Amo Fashion Center shopping bags and soak up the California sun at Redondo Beach. Unwind in our Palos Verdes hotel rooms where you'll find plush linens, ergonomic workstations and flat-panel TVs. After a peaceful slumber, power your morning in Torrance with breakfast sandwiches and Starbucks® coffee at The Bistro. In the evening, return for fresh entrées paired with your favorite cocktail. Bring intimate meetings and celebrations to life in our flexible event spaces. Commit to healthy habits when you swim laps in our outdoor pool and work up a sweat at our fitness center. Whether you're building business ties or memories, anchor your stay at the Courtyard Los Angeles Torrance/Palos Verdes hotel.Marriott

name: The Ritz-Carlton Marina del Rey
address: 4375 Admiralty Way, Marina del Rey, CA 90292
description: The Ritz-Carlton, Marina del Rey has the distinction of being the closest hotel to the water of any Ritz-Carlton hotel in the US. The hotel is elegantly situated on one of the largest recreational marinas in the world. There are 304 guest rooms and suites which feature luxurious amenities complemented with the legendary service of The Ritz-Carlton. Cast & Plow restaurant offers locally sourced and farm-fresh ingredients paired with craft cocktails and a revered wine list. Unwind at the heated saltwater waterfront pool and whirlpool. Activities include tennis, paddleball, SUP paddleboards, bicycling and skateboarding. Located less than five miles from Los Angeles International Airport and close to Venice Beach, Malibu and Santa Monica, visitors have easy access to the most popular attractions in Southern California including shopping, theatres, theme parks, studio tours, museums and beaches. The hotel is also 20 minutes from the 53-acre Porsche Experience Center which offers eight unique driving modules.Marriott

name: The Maybourne Beverly Hills
address: 225 North Canon Drive, Beverly Hills, CA 90210
description: This Beverly Hills hotel offers a rooftop pool with a sun terrace. Free WiFi is available and Frette bathrobes are provided. Crypto.Com Arena is a 20 minute drive away. A 42-inch flat-screen satellite TV is included in all guest rooms at The Maybourne Beverly Hills. All guestrooms provide guests with 24/7 access to all of the hotel's amenities and offerings. A seating area is also included and guests can enjoy slippers in the private bathroom. The Terrace, complete with a large outdoor dining patio overlooking Beverly Canon Gardens, serves California-inspired cuisine and guests can enjoy a cocktail at the Maybourne Bar. The on-site spa includes a sauna and a hot tub at no cost. Los Angeles International Airport (LAX), the SoFi Stadium and the Hollywood Bowl are a 30 minute drive away.

name: The Ritz-Carlton Los Angeles
address: 900 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Set within vibrant downtown surroundings, The Ritz-Carlton, Los Angeles effortlessly embodies the timeless appeal of a legendary city. Located at L.A. LIVE, home to world-class sports and extraordinary live entertainment, our luxury hotel in Los Angeles, CA features a captivating atmosphere shaped by dynamic surroundings. Discover a singular sense of place through luxurious accommodations, dramatic downtown L.A. skyline views, relaxing spa services and imaginative cuisine, all enhanced by unparalleled local access. This is where the free spirit of southern California combines with the discerning sophistication of Los Angeles.Marriott

name: Residence Inn by Marriott Los Angeles L.A. LIVE
address: 901 West Olympic Boulevard, Los Angeles, CA 90015
description: Experience space with modern conveniences in the City of Angels at Residence Inn Los Angeles L.A. LIVE. Our dual-branded hotel near Oakland places you in the heart of the downtown district, across from the renowned Los Angeles Convention Center and next to the L.A. LIVE Campus. See a game at the nearby Crypto.com Arena (formerly Staples Center), or go to a concert at the Microsoft Theater, home to the Emmys and the American Music Awards. Back at our hotel, discover extended-stay, apartment-style living with valet parking and free Wi-Fi. Start each day with a complimentary hot breakfast and end with bistro-style cuisine at our hotel restaurant, Table 901. Soak up the California sunshine as you unwind by our third-floor rooftop pool. Each one of our 219 pet-friendly hotel suites showcases a full kitchen, a flat-screen TV, a well-lit work desk and stunning views of downtown L.A.Marriott
